hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"If a dog licks the vessel of any one of you, let him wash it seven times, the first time with dust

chapter.ara-name: باب تَعْفِيرِ الإِنَاءِ بِالتُّرَابِ مِنْ وُلُوغِ الْكَلْبِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Rubbing A Vessel Licked By A Dog With Dust
